metadata.title: Difference between the RZ/G series and RZ/V series

sections.content:
Question:
What is the difference between the RZ/G series and RZ/V series?
Answer:
The RZ/G series has specifications suitable for applications such as HMI. 
The RZ/V series incorporates our proprietary AI accelerator DRP-AI and has product specifications that focus on the Vision AI market. 
In addition, since the RZ/G2L and RZ/V2L have pin compatibility, you can add an AI feature easily.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2L, RZ/V2M
